anomalies.title: Operational Crisis Escalation Pattern
anomalies.detail: 15-month decline accelerating: Nov 2025 'poor performance' ‚Üí Feb 2026 'business is floundering' while 7 Cellars achieves excellence in 10 days using identical tools.

anomalies.title: Executive Commitment Breakdown
anomalies.detail: 'Come hell or high water' KPI promise broken one week later. Trevor still blocking implementation citing 'unintended consequences' concerns.

anomalies.title: Q1 Revenue Forecast at Risk
anomalies.detail: Key accounts struggling in 60-day testing period threatening Feb/March/April projections despite hitting 95-96% January target.

anomalies.title: Execution Leadership Performance Gap
anomalies.detail: Heath (executive coach) assessment: Trevor 'not world-class operator' - strategist who builds models vs drives results. Need 'organizing force' who 'kicks ass, pushes into territory.'

anomalies.title: Critical Property Financing Deadline
anomalies.detail: BNC Bank pressing for financial documentation with April 3rd closing date. Multiple email alerts from Nicholas Zarikos indicating time-sensitive requirements.
